Other than that I found this torrent to be fantastic and look forward to actually asitting down and watching it. Thanks Great magican, the kingdom rules.
Beautiful copy. I've never seen a move this far from actual DVD release, look this good. The video is on par with DVD but the sound is incredible.
There is jerky playback throughout. Video quality is excellent, but it really kills the actions scenes if they're jittery.

How can you guys say that the video quality is excellent? There's way too much edge-enhancement and it looks quite bad on a bigger screen. I doubt that the original had this amount of haloing. The video is also a bit jerky.

Video quality: 6/10

I wasn't sure whether to d/l this based on the comments but I'm glad I took the chance, you won't be disappointed either - it's a full film, great picture quality and sound quality is good (tho we had our tv turned up quite high but for a free film is that really a negative?  Easy enough to turn the volume down once the film was finished eh?!).

It's a very funny, action packed film - thanks GreatMagician, your a star!
